y_means: Your symptoms may indicate that you need an adjustment of our medications.
r_flags: Are struggling to breathe or have unrelieved shortness of breath while sitting still
r_means: You need to be evaluated by a health care professional immediately.

g_flags: No chest pain or chest tightness
g_means: Continue to take your medications as ordered.
y_flags: Swelling of your feet, ankles, legs or stomach
r_flags: Have chest pain not relieved or reoccurs after taking 3 nitro tablets
Have confusion or can’t think clearly

g_flags: HbA1c less than 7% if you are a Diabetic

y_flags: An uneasy feeling—you know something is not right
Difficulty breathing when lying down or you sleep sitting up with extra pillows
